comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: appears to be the Potsdam (5 davit stations, 2 open upper decks, single funnel, single long row of portholes). No other HAL ship looked quite like this www.halfansite.nl/vlootlijst 1.htm

comment.author: 34876228@N04
comment._content: Could this be the S.S. Statendam?  Thanks!

comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: I think that's correct.  There are very few really clear photos I've found of SS Statendam but they all seem to have 5 lifeboats and a few really clear of SS Potsdam have 6, so I believe you are correct.  Which means, the life rings most likely say Statendam as well.
